post.description: Authenticates an admin user and creates a session

get.description: Retrieves a list of all tables in the database

post.description: Creates a new table in the database with specified columns
Deletes a table from the database

400.description: Invalid request format or missing confirmation

confirm.description: Confirmation flag to drop the table

get.description: Retrieves the size of the specified table in the database
Retrieves data from the specified table with pagination

post.description: Adds a new column to an existing database table
Removes a column from an existing database table

400.description: Invalid request format or missing confirmation

confirm.description: Confirmation flag to drop the column

get.description: Retrieves a list of all available extensions and their status
Retrieves a list of all database migrations and their status
Retrieves a list of all pending database migrations
Retrieves a list of all scheduled jobs and their status

post.description: Runs all jobs that are due to be executed
Runs all scheduled jobs regardless of their schedule
Runs a specific job regardless of its schedule

get.description: Retrieves a list of all available configuration files
Retrieves the contents of a specific configuration file

put.description: Updates the contents of a specific configuration file

get.description: Retrieves a list of all available permissions

post.description: Assigns one or more permissions to a role

put.description: Updates the permissions assigned to a role

post.description: Assigns one or more roles to a user

put.description: Removes one or more roles from a user
